Author: NyronChain Inc
Title: [ANN][ICO]NYRONCHAIN ICO - Rebuilding the IoT industry with BLE technology[ANN]
Body: What is NyronChain ?  NyronChain is a platform and ecosystem for the Internet of Things industry, that uses the Bluetooth low energy beacons technology to track goods and services and store that information in a public distributed ledger, that doesn´t need third parties to operate. NyronChain´s primary goal is to remove the barriers that have slowed IoT technology global adoption among the general public. We’re also passionate about developing unique approaches that will significantly advance IoT industry development.   What makes us stand out among competition ?  Unlike passive RFID and barcodes, with NyronChain beacons you don’t require to manually scan a tag to update an asset’s location. The mobile devices identify a beacon in range automatically via an app when the users get in the proximity of the beacons attached to the assets. Beacons and RFID devices cost almost the same. However, BLE solutions for asset tracking needs no other expensive readers. A simple mobile app can do the job. NyronChain beacons are already being used in Hangzhou (China) in home automation We already providing our technology to 3 Chinese companies: LifeSmart, Gizwits and Ayla.   Introduction to the ControlChain protocol: The ControlChain is an architecture to provide access control in IoT. It was created with the following principles in mind: Decentralization and Resilience. In the IoT, some devices will be restricted in the power processing capacity. Therefore, the ControlChain is a decentralized, resilient, allow off-line work and has low processor usage profile on the authorization process. Although nothing prevents all the information to be in one unique Blockchain, for organization and to facilitate the explanation, we divided the database of the ControlChain in 4 different Blockchains: Context Blockchain, Relationships Blockchain, Rules Blockchain and Accountability Blockchain. It is important to note that, based on the Blockchain principles, once an information is published on one of these Blockchain it is part of the information history and cannot be erased, however, we allow the update of the Blockchain contents with the creation of new registers.   Introduction to the NyronChain beacons: Beacons are hardware transmitters that broadcast their identifier to nearby portable electronic devices. It doesn’t require interactions or active scanning. It has a capability to deliver information on real time. Significantly, BLE solution is capable of serving several use cases simultaneously. NyronChain uses Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) technology. Unlike passive RFID and barcodes, you don’t require to manually scan a tag to update an asset’s location. The mobile devices identify a beacon in range automatically via an app when the users get in the proximity of the beacons attached to the assets.    What is NYR token ?  NYR is the token behind our platform, NYR is a utility token for paying the cost associated with using our service. The NYR token basic utility value is to pay for the cost of using the NyronChain platform. As the platform gets adopted by companies and people, the NYR token price will increase.  Token information: Name: NyronChain Symbol: NYR Type: ERC20 Max Supply: 100M Available for ICO: 60M  Crowdsale information: Start: 21st March 2018 End: 21st April 2018 Softcap: 5 556 ETH (~ 5M USD) Hardcap: 33 333 ETH (~ 30M USD) Only available Bonus: 20% Bonus on NYR tokens until SotfCap gets reached to all contributors If SoftCap doesn´t get reached all contributors will be fully refunded within 24hours  To participate visit: https://nyronchain.org/register/  For more information please visit our official website: https://nyronchain.org/

Author: NyronChain Inc
Title: [ANN][ICO]NYRONCHAIN ICO - Rebuilding the IoT industry with BLE technology[ANN]
Body: NyronChain is a company registered in China, and we own the trademark logo for this company. Anyone can check the truth of this information by contacting the China Trademark Office. We are currently mass-producing only a type of beacon, and there are Iot companies that are our clients on China, that are purchasing our platform to use it for their needs. These companies are currently using it in home automation in some China cities (Chengdu, Foshan, Guangzhou, Hangzhou, Qingdao).  Our NyronChain Platform that we are introducing this year is a way of integrating the beacons we have been producing the last 3 years with a public blockchain, where anyone can access too. Our platform is on testing phase, and our objective is expanding it for the retail, banking, healthcare, education and transportation areas in 2019.   Our CEO Ryan Zhao will be on the The IoT Solutions World Congress on Barcelona, Spain (17th October 2018) to introduce our supply management platform on Hangzhou (China), that we will be launching later this year.  Our crowdsale smart contract is being audited as we speak, but the price of each NYR token is set to 0,00056 ETH (~0,50 USD), no bonus included. But we are working with our marketing team with a bounty program that should be launched soon.  For more information read our technical whitepaper that can be found at: https://nyronchain.org/
